message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a great deal on this product. I'm willing to part with it for $13,000.  What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. Can you meet me halfway?
I appreciate your interest, Bob, but $10,000 is too low for me.  How about we split the difference and settle on $11,500?
I'm still a bit hesitant, but I'm willing to meet you halfway again. How about $11,000?
